text: During the Covid-19 outbreak
Today Helen will share 7 recipes
to improve your immune system against the Covid-19 virus.
The first dish, Apple Yogurt.

Yogurt contains many probiotic bacterias
that is good for digestion
and a great amount of Vitamin D
which could help improve your immune system against pathogens.
Add yogurt, chopped apple and cereal into a glass.
Arrange them into layers.
This dish will be a healthy choice for your breakfast or mid-day snack.
Mushroom is considered a super food that helps increase the leukocytes production and activity
to protect the body against inflammation and virus infiltration.
To make Sauteed mushrooms with turmeric, wash 200gr oyster mushroom with salt water.
Then tear the mushroom into bite-sized pieces.
And squeeze the water out.

Shave the peel of 3 finger-large turmerics, 
wash and cut into small pieces
Put the turmeric into a plastic bag and smash
to avoid the color sticking on the mortar and pestle.

High curcumin in turmerics work like an effective
anti-inflammatory and flu prevention
This is the vegetarian version of the famous central area dish - Sauteed intestine with turmeric
so Helen will add 2-3 rolls of seitan, cut into rings
to replicate boiled intestine.
Heat up some oil in the pan, then add shallot, garlic or leek
and smashed turmeric, stir until fragrant.
Stir steadily in about 1 minute
Then add mushrooms and seitan, stir for another 1-2 mins
until all coated in turmeric yellow.
Lower the heat and add seasoning.
Stir well, turn off the heat and add pepper.
Done, now plate and serve with Vietnamese mint
optionally add some cilantro and grounded peanut.
The dish is simple yet delicious and good for your health.
Ginger helps improve the immune system and is also effective in treating other infectious and inflammatory diseases.
Braising mushroom with ginger, we will have a delicious and healthy dish.

King oyster mushroom, remove the roots 
and soak in salt water in 15 mins.
Chopped in to edible pieces, add seasoning powder
and some soy sauce, stir well.
Some minced shallot to add fragrance.
Heat oil in the pan, then caramelize 1 tsp of sugar.
Add marinated mushroom and stir well.
Simmer on low heat until the sauce thicken.
Add diced ginger and pepper.
And the dish is ready.
Clams contains a great amount of zinc
a necessary mineral for optimizing the activity of immune cell.
A sweet-sour soup with clam and vitamin-rich fruits like pineapple, starfruit, and tomato
will be a great choice to improve your immune system.
First, soak clams with rice water and some chillies
to make the clams release all the sands.
You can also replace clams with mussels or beef.
Put clams into a pot with 2 bowls of water and boil.
When the clams split open, turn off the heat and take them out.
Remove any clams that didn't open for they could have been spoiled
Fry some minced garlic and put in a bowl.
Fry garlic is a must-have to take the sour soup to the next level.
Stir fry some tomatoes, then add clam broth.
Add another bowl of water and boil, then add pineapple, starfruit and tofu.
Seasoning with salt, sugar, seasoning powder and fish sauce.
And we will have a strong, balance flavored soup.
Ummm... Yummy
Fruits are good vitamin C supplies, especially orange and strawberry.
Therefore, you should eat this fruit salad dish regularly.
To make the dressing, you will need the juice of haft an orange and a kumquat.
Add sugar to balance the taste and some seasoning powder or fish sauce.
Choose some favorite lettuce and chop.
Then mix different crunchy and soft fruit together to create more interesting texture.
Apple, mango, cherry tomato
a few slices of strawberry to make it more colorful
some crunchy cucumber to detox your body
and don't forget some mint to add flavor.
Add the dressing and mix well.
Wow, delicious, gorgeous and healthy.
Garlic Butternut Squash also helps prevent diseases.
Butternut Squash contains lots of nutrients including vitamins, minerals and iron
While garlic can not only kill virus but also prevent the infiltration of other bacteria.
Remove the peel and cut the squash into cubes, then chop the garlic
and fry in hot oil pan.
Add the squash and seasoning
then add some water.
Cover and simmer in 10 mins until the squash soften.
Then add some more minced garlic to kick up the aroma.
Just simple like that, but you won't be able to stop.
Beef contains high amount of zinc, good for flu treating.
While sweet potato contains multiple vitamins.
So this Sweet potato and beef soup is absolutely perfect
to fill your empty stomach and prevent diseases.
Marinate the beef with minced shallot, pepper and stock powder.
Add some vegetable oil to quickly soften the beef
and stir in hot pan until medium rare
Add 1 liter of water and bring to boil, then add sweet potato.
Seasoning to taste, then add cilantro and scallion.
This soup is also helpful in health recovery and reducing cravings for pregnant women.
Don't forget to add more vegetable to your daily diet.
For they are not only help preventing flu
but also good for your health.
Stay healthy, and don't forget to protect yourself when going out.
Good bye and see you again.
